scripts.start-server-with-build: cd server && yarn build && yarn start
scripts.test:all: yarn test-server && cd Cardoon && yarn test --run
scripts.test:coverage: yarn test-server:coverage && cd Cardoon && yarn test --run --coverage
scripts.test:coverage:open: yarn test-server:coverage && cd Cardoon && yarn test --run --coverage && echo 'ğŸ” Opening coverage reports...' && (cd server && yarn serve coverage) & (cd Cardoon && yarn serve coverage)
